deployAll(string,uint256,bytes,uint256,b.details: This function deploys each module via their respective factories and records the project information. Emits ProjectCreated event on success.

params.fundInitData: The initialization data for the Fund module (encoded as bytes).
params.fundTemplateId: The template ID for the Fund module.
params.projectName: The name of the project to be created.
params.tokenInitData: The initialization data for the Token module (encoded as bytes).
params.tokenTemplateId: The template ID for the Token module.
params.vaultInitData: The initialization data for the Vault module (encoded as bytes).
params.vaultTemplateId: The template ID for the Vault module.
params.yieldInitData: The initialization data for the Yield module (encoded as bytes).
params.yieldTemplateId: The template ID for the Yield module.

returns._0: The address of the VaultFactory contract.
returns._1: The address of the TokenFactory contract.
returns._2: The address of the FundFactory contract.
returns._3: The address of the DividendFactory contract.

returns._0: projects The array of project structs.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addToWhitelist(address).notice: Add a user to the whitelist.

deployAll(string,uint256,bytes,uint256,b.notice: Deploy a new project with all modules (Vault, Token, Fund, Yield) in one transaction.

getFactories().notice: Get the addresses of all factory contracts.

getProjectByName(string).notice: Get project details by project name.

getUserProjectDetails(address).notice: Get project details by user address.

removeFromWhitelist(address).notice: Remove a user from the whitelist.
